channel.title: Is it possible to make follow work correctly?
channel.description: Is it possible to make follow work just like it does on RS? I have a few people that want to dance like they do on runescape. On mopar, the follow just puts you near the other user. anyway possible to make it right? Thanks.

item.title: Is it possible to make follow work correctly?
item.dc:creator: @runescapeprivate runescapeprivate
item.description:
@runescapeprivate wrote:

Is it possible to make follow work just like it does on RS?
I have a few people that want to dance like they do on runescape.
On mopar, the follow just puts you near the other user.
anyway possible to make it right?
Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to make follow work correctly?
